attributes.name: Zonrox Bleach Colorsafe Blossom Fresh

attributes.description: Zonrox Bleach Lemon is a powerful cleaning agent that combines effective stain removal with the refreshing scent of lemon. Its lemon fragrance leaves a fresh scent after cleaning, ensuring your space not only looks clean but smells inviting too.
